bind-ip.title: IP where asterisk will bind
bind-ip.description: This is the IPv6 or IPv4 that Asterisk will use to bind. By default it will use the local IPv4 of the partition.

sip-trunk-server.title: domain name or IP of the SIP trunk
sip-trunk-server.description: This is the domaine name or the IP of the SIP trunk server to use (e.g. sbc6.fr.sip.ovh).

sip-trunk-number.title: Phone number of the SIP trunk
sip-trunk-number.description: This is the phone number of the SIP trunk.

sip-trunk-password.title: Password of the SIP trunk
sip-trunk-password.description: This is the password of the SIP trunk.
